entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
